title: Argentinian president does 'Trump dance'
shortDescription: Argentina President Javier Milei did his take on Republican's favorite "Trump dance" at a CPAC event at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Trump issues new pardons for Guiliani, others
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pardoned former attorney Rudy Giuliani and dozens more in a sweeping clemency move tied to 2020 election claims.

title: Video shows Donald Trump booed, cheered at Commanders-Lions game.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump attended a NFL game between the Washington Commanders and the Detroit Lions. The crowd had strong reactions to him, like boos.

title: Supreme Court to decide if mailed ballots must be received by Election Day
shortDescription: The Republican Party, and President Donald Trump, want to prevent states from counting mailed ballots that are postmarked by Election Day but received later.

title: Maxwell, imprisoned Epstein associate, seeks Trump commutation
shortDescription: Rep. Jamie Raskin said Ghislaine Maxwell is getting special treatment in prison, including time with a puppy.

title: Senate takes step to end government shutdown
shortDescription: Eight senators broke with party ranks to vote to end the government shutdown. Here's what's next.

title: Senate Democratic Caucus members who voted to end the shutdown
shortDescription: The eight Senate Democratic Caucus members who joined Republicans to vote for ending the November 2025 shutdown

title: Trump pardons Giuliani, others accused of election interference
shortDescription: President Trump has pardoned scores of allies, including Rudy Giuliani, who faced accusations of interference in the 2020 election.

title: Turmoil and resignations hit the BBC after 'doctored' Trump speech
shortDescription: The BBC was plunged into crisis after a leaked memo revealed one of its news documentaries misled viewers. How deep do the problems go?

title: Shutdown live updates: Democrats divided on deal as SNAP in limbo
shortDescription: The Senate took a first big step Sunday night toward ending the longest-ever U.S. government shutdown.

title: Democrats attack each other over deal to end government shutdown
shortDescription: The eight Democratic defectors who joined Republicans to reopen the government are facing widespread criticism from within their party.

title: Which 8 Democratic senators voted with Republicans to end the shutdown?
shortDescription: The group includes Democratic moderates, an independent, 4 former governors and 2 senators who have announced they're retiring. None face 2026 races.

title: Senate takes a big first step in ending longest government shutdown
shortDescription: Late Sunday, the Senate took the first in a series of votes that likely will lead to the government reopening later this week.

title: BBC boss, head of news quit after Trump documentary edit criticism
shortDescription: The BBC's boss and its head of news quit following criticism over bias at the British broadcaster, including the way it edited a Trump speech.

title: Trump sees cost-of-living criticism in new poll, but Democrats get 2026 boost
shortDescription: In a survey taken before the Nov. 4 election, Democrats were seen as the preferred party to lead the next Congress amid economy frustrations.

title: Trump admin tells states to undo efforts to issue full SNAP benefits
shortDescription: The U.S. Department of Agriculture directed states to roll back any steps taken to issue full food aid benefits to low-income Americans.
